comment: Great teacher a bit different, but good teacher. Handwriting on return work very bad for TCOMM Class. She very helpful indeed.

Not a whole lot of writing, but that only means each assignment counts more towards your final average. Thankfully, she let's you resubmit your work to try and achieve a higher grade. Group presentations are a large portion of the grade, but your personal presentation outweighs your group. The formal proposal is the largest assignment, ugh.

Good teacher, for a tcomm class not a lot of writing. You will have to do formal proposal at end. She also allows you to revise submitted work and re-submit for better grade. (very bad handwriting though can't see what revisions you should make)
